definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Trousers or overalls made of sturdy denim fabric.
sentences.chinese: 用粗藍布做的褲子或套服。

sentences.english: This company will tailor a suit to order.
Why did the owner give orders for all sorts of suits for the man?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼店老闆吩咐給那個人做各種各樣的套服？

sentences.english: I have to call for my suit before the store closes.
sentences.chinese: 我必須在商店關門前取出我的套服。

sentences.english: That cooling layer must have been working overtime.
sentences.chinese: 那時套服裏的冷卻層肯定早就“過勞死”了。

sentences.english: Women's Multi-wear suits or a gorgeous dress.
sentences.chinese: 女子多穿華麗套服或連衣裙。

sentences.english: I must have this suit cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 我必須在商店關門前取出我的套服。

sentences.english: Have you noticed professor Lin’s new suit?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到林教授的新套服沒有？

definition: outfit or suit (of clothes)/set of coordinated items/kit
ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
